parameters.name: BAppend
parameters.description: True to add this selection to the current selection, false to replace the current selection list with this selection

parameters.name: SelMark
parameters.description: Selection mark to assign to this midpoint or endpoint

title: IEdgePoint.Select
description: Selects a midpoint on an edge or an endpoint or midpoint on a reference curve.
signature:
System.Boolean Select( 
   System.Boolean
BAppend
,
   System.Int32
SelMark
)

parameters.name: BAppend
parameters.description: True to add this selection to the current selection, false to replace the current selection list with this selection

parameters.name: SelMark
parameters.description: Selection mark to assign to this midpoint or endpoint

returns: True if an endpoint or midpoint is selected, false if not
